text: Ojo kase, ki ʙunjoni [kori] xeşro ʙar pojai parhezgorī va xuşnudii Alloh taolo ʙino nihoda,ʙehtar ast jo kase, ki ʙunjoni xeşro ʙar laʙi partgohi furūrextanie ʙino nihodaast va ʙo on dar otaşi duzax sarnagun megardad? Va Alloh taolo gurūhi sitamgoronro [ʙa saʙaʙi kufru nifoqaşon] hidojat namekunad
